meanings.definition: A white sauce made with cheese, typically used in dishes such as macaroni and cheese.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious mornay for the pasta dish.
meanings.sent2: The mornay added a creamy texture to the baked macaroni.
meanings.sent3: The mornay sauce danced with the pasta in a cheesy waltz.
meanings.sent4: The mornay sauce blanketed the macaroni like a cozy cheese quilt.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the mornay filled the kitchen, tempting everyone to try the dish.

meanings.definition: A dish, typically seafood or vegetables, topped with a mornay sauce.
meanings.sent1: The seafood mornay was a hit at the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: The vegetables were smothered in a rich mornay sauce.
meanings.sent3: The mornay sauce on the seafood whispered secrets of flavor.
meanings.sent4: The mornay sauce on the vegetables was a delicious crown.
meanings.sent5: The golden hue of the mornay sauce made the dish look irresistible.

meanings.definition: To prepare or serve a dish with mornay sauce.
meanings.sent1: She decided to mornay the pasta for tonight's dinner.
meanings.sent2: They mornay dishes at the restaurant to add a special touch.
meanings.sent3: He mornayed the seafood with expertise and care.
meanings.sent4: Mornaying the vegetables elevated the dish to a gourmet level.
meanings.sent5: The chef's skill in mornaying was evident in the exquisite taste of the dish.
